errorCodes.flow-2001: Either the flow package is not a valid zip format or it's an empty zip

errorCodes.flow-2004: Unexpected error while parsing the flow-definition.json file

errorCodes.flow-2011: Execution phase missing in flow package

errorCodes.flow-3015: Server encountered error while connecting with DB

execute.name: Name
execute.failureMessage: Oops! Something went wrong starting an instance of flow
execute.failedToRetrieveInstance: An instance of the flow has been started successfully, but failed to retrieve the instance. Please contact the administrator

execute.unauthorized: You are not authorized to start a flow.

validateName.specialCharsNotAllowed: Use only letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers and spaces
validateName.cannotStartWithSpecial: Flow instance name cannot start with “-“, “_“ or space

delete.content: Deleting an instance means you won't be able to review the result or troubleshoot the flow further. Are you sure you want to proceed?
